content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Power Generation System
Consists of:
- Steam engine at (-4.5, 12.5)
- Boiler at (-4.5, 16.0) with coal fuel
- Offshore pump at (-3.5, 27.5)
- Connected by pipe groups carrying water and steam
- Electric network with multiple poles connecting machines

### Iron Mining and Smelting Setup 1
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill at (-28.0, -61.0)
- Storage chest at (-27.5, -59.5)
- Burner inserter at (-26.5, -59.5)
- Stone furnace at (-25.0, -59.0)
- Output chest at (-22.5, -58.5) containing iron and copper plates
- Burner inserter at (-23.5, -58.5)

### Iron Mining and Smelting Setup 2
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill at (-18.0, -53.0)
- Storage chest at (-17.5, -51.5)
- Burner inserter at (-16.5, -51.5)
- Stone furnace at (-15.0, -51.0)
- Output chest at (-12.5, -50.5) containing iron plates
- Burner inserter at (-13.5, -50.5)

### Coal Mining Setup
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill at (41.0, -82.0)
- Storage chest at (41.5, -80.5) containing coal
- Burner inserter at (41.5, -79.5)

### Automation Science Pack Production Line
Consists of:
- Input chest at (5.5, 13.5)
- Burner inserter at (6.5, 13.5)
- Assembling machine 1 at (8.5, 13.5)
- Burner inserter at (10.5, 13.5)
- Output chest at (11.5, 13.5)
- Connected belt groups for material transport
- Additional furnace at (14.0, 14.0)

ERROR TIPS

### Errors when trying to extract non-existent items
- Verify items exist in the chest before attempting extraction
- Multiple failed attempts to extract automation science packs from output chest when none were present

### Resource shortage errors in assembling machine
- Ensure all required ingredients (copper plates and iron gear wheels) are available before starting production
- The assembling machine cannot create automation science packs due to missing copper plates

### Fuel management issues
- Keep track of fuel levels in machines
- Ensure coal is available in inventory before attempting to refuel boilers and other machines

### Production line efficiency
- Monitor the production line to ensure all components are working and properly supplied
- Check if inserters are properly positioned and fueled
- Ensure proper connection between components via belts or inserters
